meanings.definition: Lungyis: a type of traditional garment worn in Southeast Asia
meanings.sent1: She wore a colorful lungyis to the festival.
meanings.sent2: The market was filled with vendors selling lungyis of different patterns.
meanings.sent3: The lungyis danced in the wind as the laundry hung outside.
meanings.sent4: His collection of lungyis was a rainbow of fabrics and designs.
meanings.sent5: The silky texture of the lungyis made them a favorite among the locals.

meanings.definition: Lungyis: plural form of lungyi, a type of traditional garment worn in Southeast Asia
meanings.sent1: The dancers twirled gracefully in their lungyis.
meanings.sent2: During the ceremony, everyone wore lungyis as a sign of respect.
meanings.sent3: The lungyis piled up in the corner, waiting to be washed.
meanings.sent4: The vibrant colors of the lungyis brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: She carefully folded each lungyis before placing it in the drawer.
